name: Fragments
description: Fragments is an asymetrical VR/desktop game where 2 players fight each other to save their planet. Win after an intense battle with your friends, take as many fragments as you can in a time trial or quietly explore the universe of the game to extend the experience without any pressure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i5-7600K Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Storage: 700 MB available space
